reviews.review: Для потери нервов, денег и времени просто супер! Всем рекомендую!

I started off from CS:CZ, just played around by shooting bots at that time. But this game that really test your skills in communication, teamwork, aiming, map knowledge which can be improved with more time and effort put into it. The skins stuff is also quite interesting as you can invest in it to maybe make some profit which i'm not really into.

I would say the game has improved since it was released i guess we'll just see where it goes from now. It's just a fun game i like to play with friends in a squad and get destroyed completely losing 0-16 as long as we're having fun.

Сильверы - выпускают всю обойму не попадают
Нова - выпускают половину и убивают
Калаши - Хуже сильверов
Биг стары - Монстры, беги и бойся
Беркуты - как менты которым надо на пенсию уже
Глобал - Загадочные существа

Good mechanics, but poor matchmaking and poor server handling.

Im tired of carrying my team and dealing with russian people speaking only russian.

I wish there was a clone that doesn't include p2w or weird abnormal skills from MOBA games.
